about-description-1: I'm passionate about creating things. No matter whether as a Frontent Developer, or Project manager. For me the most important is an impact on the final product.
about-description-2: As manager I'm focusing on my team. Firstly, the people, because when we are united we can easily create products.
about-description-3: When I'm coding I work step by step, from one version to another version. Just like in Scrum methodology.
about-description-4: Besides IT I love fantasy books and games, especially from the polish game studio CD Projekt Red.
wmsdev-description-1: Active programmer, Project Manager and co-president of the WMS_DEV scientific club at Wroc≈Çaw University of Technology.
wmsdev-description-2: We create web applications for the student community, all based on Scrum and market-leading technologies.
